html:
4.20.21  10:07 am   when will you do a collab with damien maymdien 

      january 2018

4.20.21  10:00 am   is the line ' it's 4.99, some call it 3.95, some call it a billion' a reference to the rampant inflation in Africa

      no, but i considered using some zimbabwe notes for a graphic

4.20.21  9:49 am   is Got Some Money your most polished and sharpest work to date?

      i'm not sure

4.20.21  9:42 am   whats your favorite key

      F

4.20.21  9:39 am   Is there some sort of connection to the songs that you made this year?

      i've actually only made 1 song this year so far, but i'm going to make a lot more. the connection will be that they were made by me

4.20.21  9:38 am   Have you ever made an unintentional typo or grammatical error in a video before?

      yes

4.20.21  9:21 am   were you predicting the future with this https://billwurtz.com/i-just-did-a-bad-thing.mp4

      no

4.20.21  9:12 am   What stuff do you use to make the music?

      'measured judgement'

4.20.21  9:03 am   who do you write songs for? 

      you

4.20.21  8:30 am   Yesterday I went browsing your notes and read most of them out loud to myself and suffered many mid life crises. What exactly was your thought process when you wrote the notes?

      one of the main reasons for writing in text, is it is a much quicker way to express ideas than recording a song and producing a music video

4.20.21  8:28 am   What were your thoughts about the hit movie Garfield starring Bill Murray?

      i haven't seen it, i only know bill murrey's thoughts which was oops

4.20.21  8:26 am   Do you plan to make more songs a little bit darker than normal? Something like intro of "got some money". 

      i think you can witness the typical scenario in that song. if you start it there, it's only a matter of time before it explodes into light

4.20.21  8:19 am   how many times is the game supposed to change?

      1 or 2

4.20.21  7:55 am   what is money i dont understand it

      it's a place holder for what someone might value

4.20.21  7:13 am   will your new song contain the note G?

      i'd say there's about an 84% chance. i'm estimating this with no knowledge of what key the song will be in or even which song it will be

4.20.21  6:58 am   Is life meaningless ?

      according to my calculations, no

4.20.21  6:03 am   am i the only one who thought that the song 'hey jude' by the beatles was about two lesbians?

      no i'm sure someone else thought that. there has been a lot of thinking done about beatles songs

4.20.21  6:00 am   Is it really hard to make a song?

      the hardest part is remembering how easy it is

4.20.21  5:33 am   I feel like our community bitching has turned into both an assignment & a crucible for you.  A crucible that only makes production gods.  You chose to dive into this 'alone' as it were & once you got gud on your own accord in the post history music videos, we all felt it necessary to bitch/teach you all of these different things.  60fps, blender, new final cut, get a new mic, get an external ADC, etc.  The point being, save for a brief burnout & massive learning curve, you now have a gift very few artists can do: you not only produce & master your own music, you produce & master your own music videos, the most demanding thing in the entire industry, & you've done it efficiently & effectively through sheer application of pragmatism, generalism & will.  You now exist in a league all your own.  That said, watch out for him heidecker he's the anti-you. Actually you two should start a beef on his podcast.  Will you start a beef on him Heidecker's podcast?

      that actually sounds like a nice career move for both of us. i'll see if we can have that arranged

4.20.21  4:39 am   is your latest song about feeling poor when you're rich and rich when you're poor?

      that's an interesting way to look at it

4.20.21  4:31 am   Can you explain 1 way that Friends and Lovers can go all the way?

      sometimes just showing up is all it takes

4.20.21  4:24 am   how many times do you use the word "money" in your newly released song? I'm too lazy to count.

      i'm too busy writing the next song to count

4.20.21  3:48 am   What is your typical songwriting process??

      it's a multi process process, which i've explained here before and i will probably explain again

4.20.21  3:35 am   What's your favorite number below -2?

      -3

4.20.21  3:16 am   Do you think you will try an orthographic projection music video in the near future?

      i just did one

4.20.21  3:00 am   is the line "I can see where all the money in the world has gone, it's swimming across the floor in the ocean" about plastic or something

      that's an interesting way to look at it

4.20.21  1:50 am   How is your plan for future music videos? Will you alternate 3d and 2d, only use 3d sometimes, or mix them? (Since your newest video is in 2d again) 

      my plan is to release as many songs as possible in my life time, and make awesome videos for them in any way possible

4.20.21  1:32 am   what universe do your songs exist in?

      the same one as you

4.20.21  12:47 am   why am i having so much fun ruining my life

      you are getting excited about building it again

4.20.21  12:31 am   do you think of the main idea for a song then write the lyrics based on it,

     no

      or do you stitch together various lyrics and ideas and try to connect them together?

      no

4.20.21  12:29 am   How would you describe your music videos art style? Preferably in 5 words.

      if it could be described in only words then i wouldn't have to do it

4.20.21  12:11 am   what'd you use to make the video for got some money

      'measured judgement'

4.20.21  12:08 am   aren't all songs just pop in different flavors 

      i guess it depends how popular they are

4.19.21  11:52 pm   Thoughts on the pasteurization process?

      easier said than done

4.19.21  11:41 pm   Why are palm trees relatively common in your videos? 

      for communication purposes

4.19.21  11:31 pm   What's something you've always wanted to do?

      a talk show

4.19.21  11:18 pm   Why does it say "memory" at 1:02 in your newest song? 

      as a sensible sounding excuse for why the pattern is not completed all the way through

4.19.21  11:17 pm   How did you magically get so good at animating over the years? Was it practice or did the unicorns come and leave glitter in your brain?

      one of the best things i'm learning to do, is to get out of the way of myself

4.19.21  10:55 pm   would you ever consider showing your tools and your process for making a song?

      yes

4.19.21  10:31 pm   what's it like to have the name Bill

      it's fucking hilarious

4.19.21  10:31 pm   are you in any way related to george washington

      that's fairly likely

4.19.21  10:11 pm   Do you think of color theory when you make your videos or do you use colors intuitively 

      i was hoping theory is intuitive

4.19.21  10:06 pm   why are you posting first the video on YouTube and then the song on music streaming platforms after a day or so? I would like to have the option to have both at the same time.

     i would like this too, but time zones fuck this all up

     but don't worry, if it works for you, it's okay

     it does not work very well for me but it's the best option i have

4.19.21  9:39 pm   How would you describe your genre of music?

      regular

4.19.21  9:38 pm   what kind of music do you listen to

      normal

4.19.21  9:11 pm   Why do you favor writing songs in major keys over minor?

      i guess i'm just .......... "happy"

4.19.21  8:57 pm   Do you think the jury made a mistake on the "Blurred Lines" case?

      yes

4.19.21  8:44 pm   why is the money swimming across the floor of the ocean?

      safe keeping

4.19.21  7:54 pm   How do you find the right mix between wit wisdom, and irony?

      gonna have to taste test

4.19.21  7:44 pm   how come you switched from helvetica to arial (yes i could tell, yes i have a problem)

      i simply didn't realize
